document.full_text: in a new powerpoint presentation, mary meeker examines u.s. finances as if the country were a business, then asks what a turnaround expert would do to put usa inc. back in the black.
document.title: way of the world: analyzing the u.s. like a business
lines_and_colors: in a new powerpoint presentation, mary meeker examines u.s. finances as if the country were a business, then asks what a turnaround expert would do to put usa inc. back in the black.
